description: Write a function that extracts the root domain from a `hostname` (e.g., 'sub.api.google.com' -> 'google.com') and checks if it matches `root_domain` (case-insensitive). Example (Match): matches_root_domain("sub.api.google.com", "google.com") -> 1. Example (No Match): matches_root_domain("google.api.com", "google.com") -> 0.
